action.action-desc: Mr. Tonko (for himself and Mr. Armstrong) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to extend the requirement for State Medicaid plans to provide coverage for medication-assisted treatment.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Extending Access to Addiction Treatment Act.

section.header: Extending requirement for State Medicaid plans to provide coverage for medication-assisted treatment

subsection.text: Section 1905(a)(29) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1396d(a)(29)) is amended by striking 2025 and inserting 2035.

Section 1006(b)(4)(A) of the Substance Use-Disorder Prevention that Promotes Opioid Recovery and Treatment for Patients and Communities Act (42 U.S.C. 1396a note) is amended by striking 2025 and inserting 2035.
